Name: Fort Golf
About the game: Wrap your brain around 76 levels of puzzling, golfing fun in Fort Golf, a puzzle mini-golf platformer. Many tricky obstacles complicate the quaint castle themed courses. With limited putts available, each level has a unique solution, which may not be as simple as it looksâ€¦ PUTT THROUGH CHALLENGING PUZZLES Navigate through shifting platforms, deadly spikes, scorching lava pools, and much more. Each set of levels brings new obstacles and mechanics to figure out. FIND HIDDEN CHESTS Find chests scattered throughout the courses. Each one contains a unique item. COLLECT SPECIAL ITEMS Change the look of your golf ball with collectible skins. Unlock bonus levels by finding keys. Teleport to new areas with magical runes. SOLVE BONUS PUZZLES Figure out crafty new solutions to reach those gleaming treasure chests and reap the rewards.
